questions.text: Do you think she was having an affair with someone?

answers.text: Oh, yes... His name is Alex;I hope he’s fine...;I don’t want to talk about this now.
What?!?;Well... maybe...;I mean, I didn't know where she has been most of the time so...;Who knows...;Maybe she met someone in that pub...
I thought this would be a serious meeting...;I feel insulted
